REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0355 reute r f BC-KAYDON-<KDON.O>-NAMES 04-17 0055

TEXT.TITLE: KAYDON <KDON.O> NAMES NEW CHAIRMAN
TEXT.BODY: Kaydon Corp said president Richard A. Shantz has been named chairman, succeeding Glenn W. Bailey, who remains on the board. The company said Lawrence J. Cawley, who had been president of the Bearing Division, has ben named to succeed Shantz as Kaydon president. Reuter
